jobTitle: YMCA Expanded Learning Site Manager - ASES
description:
As a Site Manager you will be responsible for the day-to-day operations of the expanded learning program. Daily program components include: academic tutoring, mentoring, healthy lifestyles education, and other academic enrichment curricula and activities. In addition, you will be developing staff through observations and coaching. A strong emphasis on safety, meeting and maintaining program requirements, building relationships with various stakeholder and program quality is demanded of this position. Program hours are between 12:00 p.m. - 6:30 p.m., Monday through Friday (Everyday). Actual schedule varies by site (Flexible Hours).

Essential Functions

  • Responsible for program development, planning and supervision in accordance with ASES requirements, partner agencies and YMCA standards.
  • Responsible for supervision of staff and children in the program, curriculum planning and implementation and public relations.
  • Responsible for accurate counts on all children that attend.
  • Conduct a range of activities that promote family involvement, membership by design, and relationship by design.
  • Ensure the program has necessary supplies and equipment; report any issues to their direct supervisor.
  • Prepare and develop lesson plans that are age appropriate and consistent with the mission of the YMCA.
  • Follow site and Association policies and procedures for health, safety, and nutrition.
  • Attend all staff meetings, trainings and other YMCA functions as required by Supervisor.
  • Maintain open lines of communication with staff, parents, and supervisor.
  • Responsible for supervising part time employees and volunteers.
  • Assist with hiring, training and scheduling program staff and volunteers.
  • Conduct and facilitate regular staff meetings.
  • Ensure that administrative requirements are met.
  • Perform other duties as assigned

We are looking for Site Managers who demonstrates a desire to serve others and fulfill community needs. If this sounds like a job for you please apply for this position!
